summary: This mod adds Lurtz from LOTR to Riverwood
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#999999][url=http://www.ld-host.de/][img]http://www.ld-host.de/uploads/images/eaabd8021632762c9c9ea96d93a5888d.jpg[/img][/url]
[b][font=Arial][size=6]L   U   R   T   Z[/size][/font][/b]
_________________________________________________________________________


[size=5][font=Georgia]LANGUAGE[/font]:[/size][/color][size=5] [/size][b][size=5][font=Georgia][color=#999999]English[/color][/font][/size][/b]
[b][size=5]
[/size][/b][b][color=#b6b6b6][size=3]NEWEST VERSION: 1.0
[/size][/color][/b][color=#666666]
_________________________________________________________________________[/color]


[u][b][color=#999999][font=Arial][size=5]1. DISCRIPTION[/size][/font][/color][/b][/u]
[size=3]
[/size][font=Arial][color=#999999][size=3]FIND THE HOBBITS, FIND THEM!!!!!!

Hi Dragonborn,

instead of an ordinary orc I can now introduce to you the
deadly warrior, who unfortunatly died too early in LOTR and
gets a new chance in Skyrim: Lurtz the fighting uruk-hai! He
is a deadly fearce warrior, he isn 't amused at all and his
normal condition is beeing angry and he loves to cut elves
into peaces! 

For sure there are some girls who would like, and yes, he is marriagable!

Visit Riverwood and have a look to the former "sleeping giant
inn" which now is the "DEAD giant inn" since "Lurtz" killed him...

Here is a mod-review by thyworm. BiG Thanks for this!!!
Now you can see Lurtz in aktion:

[youtube]5WZfVFi7qOs[/youtube][b] [/b]

And if you can 't get enought, have a look at my other Uruk-Hai mod!
You will find [/size][/color][/font][font=Arial][color=#999999][size=3]a link below in this section:  [u][color=#999999]9. MY OTHER MODS[/color][/u][/size][/color][/font]
[color=#666666]________________________________________________________________________[/color]
[size=5][u][b][color=#999999]
[font=Arial]2. NO DLC NEEDED/[/font][/color][font=Arial] ES WIRD KEIN DLC BENÖTIGT[/font][/b][/u][/size]
[color=#6d9eeb][size=4]
[/size][/color]
[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color]


[font=Arial][size=5][b][u][color=#999999]3. NO ADDITIONAL MOD NEEDED [/color]/ ES WIRD KEINE MOD BENÖTIGT[/u][/b][/size][/font]

[b]Big thanks to: [/b]

[b]Mandarinn[/b] for his awesome Uruk-Hai-Armor
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28793/?]Uruk-Hai Armor [/url](already part of my mod)

[b]Halendia[/b] for permission to use her great eye-colour-ressource in my mod!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30823/?]Hale - Iridum Eyes[/url] (already part of my mod / one additional eye-colour added)

[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color]

[font=Arial]
[/font][size=5][u][b][font=Arial][color=#999999]4. ADDITIONAL MODS i AM USING AND ARE USED FOR SCREENSHOTS /
[/color]MODS, DIE ICH FÜR SCREENSHOTS BENUTZTHABE[/font]
[/b][/u][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15551/?]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15551/?]zoners high performance enb[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15551/?] by [b]Shrutesh[/b][/url]

[/b][/url]

[u][b][size=5][color=#999999]5. KNOWN BUGS / [/color]BEKANNTE PROBLEME[/size][/b][/u]

[color=#999999]none so far /[/color] bisher keine

[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color]


[size=5][b][u][color=#999999]6. FINDING LURTZ [/color]/ WO DU LURTZ FINDEST[/u][/b][/size]

[color=#999999]He is hanging out next to the entrance of the "Sleeping Giant Inn" in Riverwood.
[/color]Er kann neben der Tür zum "Schlafender Riese" in Flusswald aufgelesen werden.

[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________[/color]

[u][color=#999999][size=5][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65157/?][img]http://www.ld-host.de/uploads/images/c6c3a9c5d605d6061c3665268d6cc086.gif[/img][/url]
[/b][/size][/color][/u][u][color=#999999][size=5][b]7. DISCLAIMER[/b][/size][/color][/u]

[color=#999999]This follower was created by me, if there is a doubt, please have a look 
at my steam-account there is the total of all my mods. This mod does no questrelevant changes, 
so it can 't influence or damage your game at this point, as far as I know. 
Still, there is always danger using a mod, so i take no responsibility if it crashes your game, 
but this mod is cleaned with TESVedit so there is just the minimal thread like always when using a mod. 

[/color][u][b][size=5]7. KLARSTELLUNG[/size]
[/b][/u]
Der in dieser Mod enthaltene Follower wurde von
mit erstellt,sollten Zweifel daran bestehen 
bitte auf folgendem Steamprofil nachschauen. Dort kann man alle meine Mods ebenfalls 
runterladen. Abgesehen davon übernehme ich keine Verantwortung, wenn euer Spiel 
aus was für Gründen auch immer abstürzen sollte, oder unspielbar werden sollte. 
Diese Mod ist mit TESVEdit von "dirty edits" gereinigt worden uns sollte keine größeren
Probleme verursachen. Es ist immer ein Risiko eine Mod zu verwenden, 
aber ich habe versucht dieses klein zu halten.

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197993479673/myworkshopfiles/?appid=72850][color=#6d9eeb]My profile on steam[/color][/url][color=#6d9eeb][url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197993479673/myworkshopfiles/?appid=72850]
[/url][/color]
[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________
_________________________________________________________________________[/color]

[color=#999999][size=5][u][b]8. A SUGGESTION[/b][/u][/size][/color]

[color=#999999]Just a suggestion at the end of the discription: For less CDT-Issues in general 
while playing the game, you should use LOOT for the right loadorder and TESVEdit aswell to get 
rid fo so called "dirty edits". It 's not that difficult as it seems and I was able to 
minimise crashes on my computer to nearly zero! Have a look a "GOPHERS" tutorials on 
youtube to get to know how to handle these programms!

[/color][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SzoyWugzZAw]Gophers loot tutorial[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fw3g_N1jcZQ]Gophers TESVEdit tutorial
[/url]
[color=#666666]_________________________________________________________________________
_________________________________________________________________________[/color]
